name: rêverie éclairée par des étoiles
description:
a starlit reverie about the masks i wear and my thoughts about masks in general...

expect no functionality

(Originally intended to be submitted for the RMIT 'Mask' Game Jame 2017, but I worked on it for an extra day lol)

(lynchian themes are featured thanks to influence of  Michael Krekelberg )
